title: Deadlock
text: Description: The product contains multiple threads or executable segments that are waiting for each other to release a necessary lock, resulting in deadlock. Consequences: Availability DoS: Resource Consumption (CPU) DoS: Resource Consumption (Other) DoS: Crash, Exit, or Restart Each thread of execution will "hang" and prevent tasks from completing. In some cases, CPU consumption may occur if a lock check occurs in a tight loop.
